snippet: Arab states have a responsibility to make sure the Palestinian Authority remains viable.
abstract: Editorial warns that Palestinian Authority, which governs parts of West Bank not under Israeli control, is in financial crisis; calls on Arab states and international community to help preserve and strengthen Palestinian Authority, saying all have a stake in its well-being.
lead_paragraph: Arab states have a responsibility to make sure the Palestinian Authority remains viable.

headline.seo: Financial Crisis in the West Bank
headline.main: Financial Crisis in the West Bank
headline.print_headline: Financial Crisis in the West Bank
